Description: Role-based authentication and JWT enforcement across Admin Doctor Patient
Admin can login and receive JWT token with admin role
Doctor can login and receive JWT token with doctor role
Patient can login and receive JWT token with patient role
Admin can view all upcoming and past appointments
Search doctors by name or specialization
Search patients by name or ID
Doctor marks appointment completed with diagnosis and treatment
Doctor cancels appointment before start time
Doctor provides availability for next 7 days
Doctor can view full patient treatment history
Patient books appointment with conflict prevention
Patient cancels appointment before start time
Patient views appointment history with diagnosis and treatment
Prevent overlapping appointments for same doctor
Async jobs using Redis and Celery
Generate monthly HTML or PDF report for doctors
Async CSV export of patient treatment history
Notify user when async job finishes
